path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/CYBR Token Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Possible to mint more than the set maximum supply of the tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting a certain amount of tokens to a specific _premintRecipient address without checking against MAX_SUPPLY, potentially exceeding the set maximum supply.

findings.title: Unlocked pragma
findings.description: Contracts should be deployed with the same compiler version and flags that they have been tested with thoroughly. Locking the pragma helps to ensure that contracts do not accidentally get deployed using, for example, an outdated compiler version that might introduce bugs that affect the contract system negatively.

findings.title: Public functions that could be declared external inorder to save gas
findings.description: Defining public functions as external can save gas by avoiding unnecessary memory copying of input parameters.
